title: Apple noodle kugel
ingredients: ['50g raisins', '2 tablespoons golden rum', '1 large apple or 2 smaller apples', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 eggs', '60g light brown soft sugar or demerara sugar', '250g Greek yoghurt', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 generous pinch of freshly grated nutmeg', '1 pinch of salt', '450g wide egg noodles, cooked']
